title: Pixel 2xl keep shutting down. The battery is full yet it close by himself and I have to restart it.
content:
Pixel 2xl keep shutting down. Moment I leave my phone away when I pick it up it will be shut down. It will be able to restart correctly but eventually will shut down again . The battery % seems wrong sometmes. It goes from 60 to 15 in 2 minutes, then when it shut down and I restsrt it, it's back to 60. 

I have tried to reset to factory settings it didn't solve the issue.
